I18nSelectorWidget.label-i18n-select: Select and add an internationalization to make it available

group.label: Group mode
group.description: The players collaborate each to other in a group

class.label: Class mode
class.description: The groups play independently and are in competitions

ActivityEditorWidget.label-mission-activity-tree-of: Tree of possible activities into the mission:
ActivityEditorWidget.label-select-nodeType: Select a type of element to add to the tree

quest.label: Quest
quest.description: Create an interactive activity which will create a branch of possible results

branch.label: Branch
branch.description: Describes a possible path of the story

text.desc: Insert a text, pressing Remove will delete the last element chosen, Save confirms the value

number.desc: Insert a number, pressing Remove will delete the last element chosen, Save confirms the value

array.desc: Insert elements in a list by pressing Add or press Remove to eliminate the value typed in the input text, Save confirms the list

range-input.desc: Insert the minimum and maximum condition

function-input.desc: Select parameter and advanced type of condition
